title: Set an Amazon SQS FIFO queue's message group ID with an EventBridge Pipe
description: Uses Amazon EventBridge Pipes to dynamically retrieve and set the message group ID for a SQS FIFO destination queue

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This pattern demonstrates how to use an Amazon EventBridge rule, Amazon EventBridge Pipes and Amazon SQS FIFO queues to dynamically retrieve and set a message group ID from the message body for an Amazon SQS FIFO queue.

bullets.text: Amazon SQS (Simple Queue Service) FIFO (First-In-First-Out) Queues

text: See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
